stlib.datatypes.moving

Class MovingRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • stlib.datatypes.GeneralType
      • stlib.datatypes.moving.MovingObject<UnitRegionIF,RegionIF>
        • stlib.datatypes.moving.MovingRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableSpatial, GeneralTypeIF, MovingObjectIF<UnitRegionIF,RegionIF>, MovingRegionIF

    public class MovingRegion
extends MovingObject<UnitRegionIF,RegionIF>
implements MovingRegionIF
    This class represents moving spatial objects of type 'MovingRegion'
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(UnitRegionIF unit)
        Description copied from interface: MovingObjectIF
        Add/append a new unit to this 'MovingObject' object.
        Only appending is possible, if:
        - the period of the passed unit is right adjacent with the period of the last unit, or
        - the period of the passed unit is greater as the period of the last unit

        If the value of the last unit of this 'MovingObject' is equal to the value of the passed unit and if their periods are adjacent or intersects right, then the period of the last unit will be extended
        Specified by:
        add in interface MovingObjectIF<UnitRegionIF,RegionIF>
        Specified by:
        add in interface MovingRegionIF
        Overrides:
        add in class MovingObject<UnitRegionIF,RegionIF>
        Parameters:
        unit - - the unit to add/append
        Returns:
        true if the passed unit was added, false otherwise

      • add

        public boolean add(PeriodIF period,
                   RegionIF region)
        Description copied from interface: MovingRegionIF
        Append this 'MovingRegion' object by a further movement section defined by the passed values.
        Creates an constant region unit object and append this to this object.
        Specified by:
        add in interface MovingRegionIF
        Parameters:
        period - - time period of this movement section
        region - - the region
        Returns:
        true if the adding was successful, false otherwise

        Get the projection bounding box of this 'MovingRegion'
        Specified by:

        Returns:
